title: APPLY TODAY AND GET $1,000 OFF YOUR MOVE-IN COSTS!
map_address: 4901 Fairwood Blvd NE near Northshore Parkway
posting_body: ['The Fairways', '4901 Fairwood Blvd NE, Tacoma, WA, 98422', 'Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 60', 'OR Text', '60', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact our leasing team.', 'Use this link for more information:', '<URL>', 'MODERN LIVING Welcome to The Fairways Apartments', 'This is a 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1115 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Seize your chance to live in one of the premier apartment communities in the city at The Fairways Apartments.', 'Picture coming home every day to the warm embrace of meticulous landscaping, comfortable homes, and thoughtful amenities tailored to enhance your life.', 'Located in the Northeast region of the city, our Tacoma apartments provide easy access to Northshore Parkway and Hoyt Road.', 'The Fairways Apartments is just minutes away from the University of Washington - Tacoma, as well as all of the nearby shopping, dining, and entertainment.', 'We know you deserve the very best in apartment living, and our community is designed specifically to ensure you don’t just lease, you live.', 'Pet Policy', 'Pets - Max 2 allowed, One time Fee $300, Deposit $400', 'Comments: Pet Rent is $25.00 per pet.', 'Restrictions:Breed Restrictions Apply.', 'Office Hours:', 'Monday-Saturday: 9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Sunday: 10:00AM-5:00PM', 'We do not accept Comprehensive Reusable Tenant Screening Reports as defined by and pursuant to RCW 59.18.', 'VrvjLz8ICt']
